synopsis.text: Watch as the Phantom Thieves reunite for a final, daring infiltration of an enemy Palace, with the stakes higher than ever before. As they navigate through treacherous schemes orchestrated by an enigmatic foe, they must also stay one step ahead of the watchful eye of Gorou Akechi. But when a devastating turn of events leaves the team reeling from Ren Amamiya's apparent suicide, they find themselves lost and without direction. That is, until Sae Niijima bursts onto the scene with a shocking revelation that reignites their purpose and drives them to embark on one last epic heist. With everything on the line, these battle-hardened warriors of the metaverse fight to prove their justice to the world and take down their former teammate turned enemy. Get ready to have your heart stolen by this thrilling and emotional ride, culminating in a special animation event titled 'Dark Sun...' before the end of 2018.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
